questions.question: This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
Set in a samurai country closed off from the world, this arc features a rebellion against a Shogun and an Emperor of the Sea. What is...?
This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
This ability, often used by Monkey D. Luffy, drastically increases his speed and power, and changes his skin to a reddish color. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This ability, used by a Straw Hat crew member, allows them to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This character is known for their alias 'O-Nami' and their ability to manipulate weather, often seen with a weapon called the 'Clima-Tact'. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
